mapper.update: update tietou set mark = #{tietou.mark} where id = #{tietou.id}
mapper.delete:
delete from
tietou highway_tietou.tietou_2019
where id in
#{item}
mapper.select: select vlp_id from tietou GROUP BY vlp HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT axlenum) > 1
select COUNT(*) out_amount,ck station_name,ck_id station_id from tietou where vlp_id = #{carId} GROUP BY ck_id
select COUNT(*) in_amount,rk station_name,rk_id station_id from tietou where vlp_id = #{carId} GROUP BY rk_id

select car_type from (select case when vc < 10 THEN 'coach' when vc >= 10 THEN 'trucks' ELSE 'unknown' end car_type from ${tableName} where vlp_id = #{carId}) res GROUP BY car_type ORDER BY COUNT(*) desc LIMIT 1
select vc from (select vc,count(*) amount from ${tableName} where vlp_id = #{carId} group by vc) res order by amount desc limit 1

select MAX(same_station) sameStation, MAX(speed) speed, MAX(same_car_number) sameCarNumber, MAX(same_car_type) sameCarType , MAX(same_car_situation) sameCarSituation, MAX(short_dis_overweight) shortDisOverweight, MAX(long_dis_lightweight) longDisLightweight , MAX(different_zhou) differentZhou, MAX(diff_flagstation_info) diffFlagstationInfo, MAX(score) score from ${tableName} t LEFT JOIN ${featureTableName} tfs on t.id = tfs.id WHERE t.vlp_id = #{carId}

select tfe.month_time period,count(*) amount from tietou_feature_extraction tfe where tfe.vlp_id = #{carId}
and tfe.diff_flagstation_info = 1
and tfe.short_dis_overweight = 1
and tfe.long_dis_lightweight = 1
and tfe.speed = 1
and tfe.same_station = 1
and tfe.same_car_type = 0
and tfe.same_car_situation = 0
and tfe.different_zhou = 1
and tfe.same_car_number = 0
and tfe.min_out_in = 1
and tfe.same_time_range_again = 1
and tfe.flagstation_lost = 1
and tfe.high_speed = 1
and tfe.low_speed = 1
and 1=2
group by tfe.month_time

select carNoId,carNo,MAX(cheating) cheating,MAX(violation) violation,MAX(score) score from (select tc.id carNoId,tc.car_no carNo ,GREATEST(same_station,speed,same_car_type,same_car_situation,short_dis_overweight,long_dis_lightweight,diff_flagstation_info) cheating ,GREATEST(same_car_number,different_zhou) violation,score from ${scoreName} tf LEFT JOIN ${tableName} t on t.id = tf.id LEFT JOIN highway_tietou.car_dic tc on tc.id = t.vlp_id where tc.white_flag = 0) res GROUP BY carNoId ORDER BY score desc

select COUNT(DISTINCT case when e.same_car_number = 0 then e.vlp_id ELSE NULL end) sameCarNumber ,COUNT(DISTINCT case when e.speed = 1 then e.vlp_id ELSE NULL end) speed ,COUNT(DISTINCT case when e.low_speed = 1 then e.vlp_id ELSE NULL end) lowSpeed ,COUNT(DISTINCT case when e.high_speed = 1 then e.vlp_id ELSE NULL end) highSpeed ,COUNT(DISTINCT case when e.same_car_type = 0 then e.vlp_id ELSE NULL end) sameCarType ,COUNT(DISTINCT case when e.same_car_situation = 0 then e.vlp_id ELSE NULL end) sameCarSituation ,COUNT(DISTINCT case when e.short_dis_overweight = 1 then e.vlp_id ELSE NULL end) shortDisOverweight ,COUNT(DISTINCT case when e.long_dis_lightweight = 1 then e.vlp_id ELSE NULL end) longDisLightweight ,COUNT(DISTINCT case when e.different_zhou = 1 then e.vlp_id ELSE NULL end) differentZhou ,COUNT(DISTINCT case when e.diff_flagstation_info = 1 then e.vlp_id ELSE NULL end) diffFlagstationInfo ,COUNT(DISTINCT case when e.same_station = 1 then e.vlp_id ELSE NULL end) sameStation ,COUNT(DISTINCT case when e.min_out_in = 1 then e.vlp_id ELSE NULL end) minOutIn ,COUNT(DISTINCT case when e.same_time_range_again = 1 then e.vlp_id ELSE NULL end) sameTimeRangeAgain ,COUNT(DISTINCT case when e.flagstation_lost = 1 then e.vlp_id ELSE NULL end) flagstationLost from tietou_feature_extraction e
1=1
and e.car_type = 0
and e.car_type = 1

select DATE_FORMAT(t.extime,'%Y%m%d') period,COUNT(distinct t.vlp_id) amount from tietou t LEFT JOIN tietou_feature_extraction tfe on t.id = tfe.id where t.vlp_id in (select DISTINCT vlp_id from tietou_feature_statistic where score > 75)
and tfe.car_type = 0
and tfe.car_type = 1
and tfe.month_time = #{queryMonth} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(t.extime,'%Y%m%d')
select * from tietou where id = #{id}

select COUNT(*) amount,stationName from (select rk stationName, rk_id station_id from tietou where vlp_id = #{dto.carNoId} UNION ALL select ck stationName, ck_id station_id from tietou where vlp_id = #{dto.carNoId}) res GROUP BY station_id ORDER BY amount desc
select COUNT(*) amount,rk entranceStation,ck exitStation from tietou where vlp_id = #{dto.carNoId} GROUP BY rk_id,ck_id ORDER BY amount desc
select t.id,t.entime,t.extime,t.envlp_id,t.vlp_id,t.vlp,t.ck,t.rk_id,t.ck_id from tietou t where t.month_time = #{monthTime} and t.entime > #{firstTime}
select id from tietou where vlp_id = #{vlpId} and month_time = #{monthTime} and entime > #{firstTime} and ((entime > #{entime} and entime < #{extime}) or (extime > #{entime} and extime < #{extime}))
select count(*) from tietou where vlp_id = #{carId}
select axlenum period,count(*) amount from highway_tietou.tietou_2019 where vlp_id = #{carId} and axlenum != 0 group by axlenum order by amount desc
mapper.update:
update tietou_feature_extraction set flagstation_lost = 0 where id in
#{item}
mapper.select: select MAX(id) from highway_tietou.tietou_2019
select id,rk,ck,envlp,envlp_id,vlp,vlp_id,tolldistance,totalweight,vc,envc from tietou where id between #{begin} and #{end}

select id,rk,ck,envlp,vlp,rk_id,ck_id,envlp_id,vlp_id,entime,extime,month_time,envc,vc,envt,vt,totalweight,axlenum,tolldistance,flagstationinfo,realflagstationinfo from tietou where id between #{begin} and #{end}

select axlenum from highway_tietou.tietou_2019 where
vlp_id
envlp_id
= #{vlpId} and axlenum > 0
and vc between 11 and 15
and vc between 1 and 5
group by axlenum order by count(*) desc limit 1

select
vc
envc
from highway_tietou.tietou_2019 where
vlp_id
envlp_id
= #{vlpId}
and vc between 11 and 15
and vc between 1 and 5
and vc > 0 group by vc
and envc > 0 group by envc
order by count(*) desc limit 1
select id,rk_id,ck_id,envlp_id,vlp_id,flagstationinfo from tietou where id between #{begin} and #{end}
select id,flagstationinfo,realflagstationinfo,lastmoney from tietou where id between #{begin} and #{end}
select id,vlp,envlp from tietou_bak where vlp_id is null
mapper.update: update tietou_bak set vlp_id = #{tietou.vlpId} where id = #{tietou.id}
mapper.insert:
insert ignore into tietou ( month_time, entime, rk, rk_id, envlp, envlp_id, envt, envc, extime, ck, ck_id, vlp, vlp_id, vc, vt, exlane, oper, lastmoney, freemoney, totalweight, axlenum, tolldistance, card, flagstationinfo, realflagstationinfo, inv, weight_limitation ) values
( #{item.monthTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.entime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{item.rk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.rkId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.envlp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.envlpId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.envt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.envc,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.extime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{item.ck,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.ckId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.vlp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.vlpId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.vc,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.vt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.exlane,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.lastmoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.freemoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.totalweight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.axlenum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.tolldistance,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.card,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.flagstationinfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.realflagstationinfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.inv,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.weightLimitation,jdbcType=INTEGER} )

insert ignore into
tietou
highway_tietou.tietou_2019
( month_time,entime,rk,rk_id,envlp,envlp_id,envt,envc,extime,ck,ck_id,vlp,vlp_id,vc,vt,exlane,oper,lastmoney,freemoney,totalweight, axlenum,tolldistance,card,flagstationinfo,realflagstationinfo,inv,weight_limitation) values (#{monthTime},#{entime},#{rk},#{rkId},#{envlp},#{envlpId},#{envt},#{envc},#{extime},#{ck},#{ckId},#{vlp},#{vlpId}, #{vc},#{vt},#{exlane},#{oper},#{lastmoney},#{freemoney},#{totalweight},#{axlenum},#{tolldistance},#{card},#{flagstationinfo}, #{realflagstationinfo},#{inv},#{weightLimitation})
mapper.select: select axlenum, count(id) as count from tietou where vlp_id = #{vlpId} group by axlenum
select * from tietou WHERE vlp_id = #{vlpId}
select id,envlp,vlp,envlp_id,vlp_id from tietou where id in (select id from tietou_feature_extraction where month_time = #{monthTime} and same_car_number = 0 )
select envlp_id envlpId,envlp,vlp,vlp_id vlpId from tietou where id in (select id from tietou_feature_extraction where vlp_id = #{vlpId} and same_car_number = 0)
select id,vlp_id,axlenum from tietou a where id BETWEEN #{start} and #{end} and exists(select 1 from tietou_feature_extraction b where a.id = b.id and different_zhou = 1)
select count(*) from tietou where vlp_id = #{vlpId} and axlenum = #{axlenum}

SELECT count(1) inNum,t.envlp_id carId,t.envlp carNo, t.vlp outCarNo from ${tableName} t,${extractionName} e where t.id = e.id and t.vlp_id = #{carId} and t.envlp_id != #{carId} and e.same_car_number = 0 group by t.envlp_id,t.envlp order by count(1) desc limit 20
select count(1) from ${tableName} where vlp_id = #{vlpId}

select entime,tolldistance,exlane,tolldistance/TIMESTAMPDIFF(second,entime,extime)*3.6 speed,rk,envc from highway_tietou.tietou_2019 where envlp_id = #{envlpId} and vlp_id = #{vlpId} order by extime desc

select
vc period, envc period,
count(*) amount from
tietou
highway_tietou.tietou_2019
where
vlp_id envlp_id
= #{vlpId} group by
vc envc
order by amount desc

select t.entime,t.rk,t.envlp,t.envt,t.envc,t.extime,t.ck,t.vlp,t.vt,t.vc, t.exlane,t.oper,t.lastmoney,t.freemoney,t.totalweight,t.axlenum,t.tolldistance,t.card,t.flagstationinfo from tietou t,tietou_feature_extraction e where e.vlp_id = #{vlpId} and t.id = e.id and e.low_speed = 1 and e.same_time_range_again = 1

select t.entime,t.rk,t.envlp,t.envt,t.envc,t.extime,t.ck,t.vlp,t.vt,t.vc, t.exlane,t.oper,t.lastmoney,t.freemoney,t.totalweight,t.axlenum,t.tolldistance,t.card,t.flagstationinfo from tietou t,tietou_feature_extraction e where e.vlp_id = #{vlpId} and t.id = e.id and e.low_speed = 1 and e.same_car_number = 0

select t.entime,t.rk,t.envlp,t.envt,t.envc,t.extime,t.ck,t.vlp,t.vt,t.vc, t.exlane,t.oper,t.lastmoney,t.freemoney,t.totalweight,t.axlenum,t.tolldistance,t.card,t.flagstationinfo from tietou t,tietou_feature_extraction e where e.vlp_id = #{vlpId} and t.id = e.id and e.same_car_number = 0 and e.same_time_range_again = 1

select t.entime,t.rk,t.envlp,t.envt,t.envc,t.extime,t.ck,t.vlp,t.vt,t.vc, t.exlane,t.oper,t.lastmoney,t.freemoney,t.totalweight,t.axlenum,t.tolldistance,t.card,t.flagstationinfo from tietou t,tietou_feature_extraction e where e.vlp_id = #{vlpId} and t.id = e.id and e.low_speed = 1 and e.same_time_range_again = 1 and e.same_car_number = 0
select * from tietou t where t.id in (select id from tietou_feature_extraction where speed = 1)
select * from tietou t where t.id in (select id from tietou_feature_extraction where different_zhou = 1)
select * from tietou_test where id BETWEEN #{start} and #{end}

select r.* from (select count(case when vc BETWEEN 1 and 10 then 1 else null end ) carNum, count(case when vc BETWEEN 11 and 20 then 1 else null end ) trackNum, vlp_id vlpId, vlp from highway_tietou.tietou_2019 where id BETWEEN 1 and #{maxId} group by vlp_id) r, highway_tietou.car_dic c where r.vlpId = c.id and c.use_flag = 1 and carNum >= 1 and trackNum >= 1
select count(1), vlp_id vlpId, vc from tietou where id BETWEEN 1 and 4462616 and vlp_id = #{vlpId} group by vlp_id, vc order by count(1) desc
mapper.update: update tietou set vlp_id = #{vlpId} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select t.ck_id ckId, (select station_name from highway_tietou.station_dic where id = t.ck_id ) ckName, t.rk_id rkId, (select station_name from highway_tietou.station_dic where id = t.rk_id ) rkName, count(DISTINCT case when s.score BETWEEN 20 and 100 then t.vlp_id else null end) num from (select ck_id,rk_id,vlp_id from tietou where ck_id in #{item} and rk_id in #{item}) t , (select vlp_id,score from tietou_feature_statistic s where score > 50) s where t.vlp_id = s.vlp_id group by t.ck_id,t.rk_id
select vc type,count(1) count from tietou where vc BETWEEN 1 and 15 group by vc order by vc

select t.ck_id type,count(DISTINCT case when s.score BETWEEN 20 and 100 then t.vlp_id else null end) count from (select ck_id,vlp_id from tietou where ck_id in #{item} and rk_id in #{item}) t, (select vlp_id,score from tietou_feature_statistic s where score > 50) s where t.vlp_id = s.vlp_id group by t.ck_id

select count(r.vlp_id) total, r.ck_id ckId, sum(case when r.score BETWEEN 80 and 100 then 1 else 0 end) high, sum(case when r.score BETWEEN 50 and 79.99 then 1 else 0 end) middle, sum(case when r.score BETWEEN 20 and 49.99 then 1 else 0 end) low from (select DISTINCT t.vlp_id,t.ck_id,s.score from tietou_feature_statistic s,tietou t where s.vlp_id = t.vlp_id and score >= 20 and t.ck_id in #{item} ) r group by r.ck_id

INSERT INTO `tietou_test` ( routing_id, month_time, entime, rk, rk_id, envlp, envlp_id, envt, envc, extime, ck, ck_id, vlp, vlp_id, vc, vt, exlane, oper, lastmoney, freemoney, totalweight, axlenum, tolldistance, card, flagstationinfo, realflagstationinfo, inv, weight_limitation ) VALUES (#{routingId}, '201907', '2019-07-02 23:41:07', '成灌成都站', '41', '川A0TL52', '393109', '1', '1', '2019-07-02 23:56:10', '二绕西温江万春站', '89', '川HBM389', '8924808', '1', '0', '10', null, '14.000', '0.000', '2050', '2', '23060', '5001016600148749', null, null, null, '0');

select * from highway_tietou.tietou_2019 where id in (select id from (select id from highway_tietou.tietou_feature_extraction where vlp_id = #{carNoId}
and (low_speed = 1 and (short_dis_overweight = 1 or long_dis_lightweight = 1))
and (low_speed = 1 or short_dis_overweight = 1)
and (low_speed = 1 or long_dis_lightweight = 1)
limit ${limit}) res)
select * from highway_tietou.tietou_2019 where id in (select id from (select id from highway_tietou.tietou_feature_extraction where vlp_id = #{carNoId} and same_car_number = 0 limit ${limit}) res)
select id,entime,extime,rk_id,ck_id,envlp_id,vlp_id from tietou where extime >= #{beginDate} and extime < #{endDate}
select max(extime) from tietou where extime <= #{localDate}

select * from tietou where id in
#{item}

select GROUP_CONCAT(id) from
tietou highway_tietou.tietou_2019
GROUP BY vlp_id,ck_id,envlp_id,rk_id,entime,extime HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
mapper.update: update tietou set tolldistance = #{distance} where id = #{id}
update highway_tietou.tietou_2019 set tolldistance = #{distance} where id = #{id}
update highway_tietou.tietou_2019 set vlp_id = #{newVlpId} , vlp = #{carNo} where vlp_id = #{vlpId} and vc between #{beginVc} and #{endVc}
update highway_tietou.tietou_2019 set envlp_id = #{newVlpId} , envlp = #{carNo} where envlp_id = #{vlpId} and vc between #{beginVc} and #{endVc}
update highway_tietou.tietou_2019 set vlp = #{carNo} where vlp_id = #{vlpId} and vc between 11 and 15
update highway_tietou.tietou_2019 set envlp = #{carNo} where envlp_id = #{vlpId} and vc between 11 and 15
mapper.select: select threshold_value from highway_tietou.config where type = #{type}
mapper.update: update highway_tietou.tietou_2019 set vlp_id = #{oldTruckId} , vlp = #{carNo} where vlp_id = #{vlpId} and vc between 11 and 15
update highway_tietou.tietou_2019 set envlp_id = #{oldTruckId} , envlp = #{carNo} where envlp_id = #{vlpId} and vc between 11 and 15
update highway_tietou.tietou set vlp = #{vlp},envlp = #{envlp},vlp_id = #{vlpId},envlp_id = #{envlpId},ck_id = #{ckId},rk_id = #{rkId} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select max(id) from tietou
mapper.insert:
insert ignore into tietou ( id, month_time, entime, rk, rk_id, envlp, envlp_id, envt, envc, extime, ck, ck_id, vlp, vlp_id, vc, vt, exlane, oper, lastmoney, freemoney, totalweight, axlenum, tolldistance, card, flagstationinfo, realflagstationinfo, inv ) values
( #{item.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.monthTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.entime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{item.rk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.rkId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.envlp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.envlpId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.envt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.envc,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.extime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{item.ck,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.ckId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.vlp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.vlpId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.vc,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.vt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.exlane,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.lastmoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.freemoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.totalweight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.axlenum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.tolldistance,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.card,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.flagstationinfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.realflagstationinfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.inv,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select:
select max(extime) maxTime,min(extime) minTime from tietou where vlp_id in
#{item}
